name: Elementor Portfolio Builder
author: SolverWP

sections.description:
Elementor Portfolio Builder – Elementor Portfolio Addon is a fully responsive plugin that display your company or personal portfolio/ Gallery items. From admin panel you can easily add your portfolio items.

Live Demo | Upgrade to Pro! | Support

Features

  • 20 + pre made design
  • YouTube Video Support
  • Vimeo Video Support
  • included slider/Isotope/Masonry/grid/Tab style
  • Unlimited color options
  • Unlimited typography options
  • Category Filter
  • Post title show/hide also length control
  • Meta Control
  • Post Number control
  • Custom Meta Box
  • Portfolio Details page available
  • Normal Pagination
  • Ajax Pagination
  • Images Properly optimized
  • No coding require and more..
  • 24/7 Support.

Demo

  • General Style
  • Card Style
  • Isotope Style
  • Masonry Style
  • Slider Style
  • Tab Style
  • Pagination
  • Ajax Pagination
  • Portfolio Details Page
  • And More

Easy to Use – No Coding Required

You can use this plugin without any coding knowledge. It has every nessesary settings to change everythings easily. It’s has layout settings, color settings, conttent/title/meta settings and more.

RERESPONSIVE & SEO FRIENDLY

Elementor Portfolio Builder is totally is completely responsive and SEO-friendly design. In every design it’s fully mobile optimized

WORKING WITH ANY THEME

It’s working with any theme. so you can use it on your website without no issue

SUPER FAST PERFORMANCE

We follow 100% WordPress Coding standard. So it’s loading super first and performs very well.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

Let’s enjoy it

sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any WordPress theme.

Can I Customize Color, Typography and Layout

Yes, You can easily change color,typoraphy and layout. Every necessary settings has this plugin.

Is this plugin totally free.

Yes, it’s totally free, But we also have premium version with more style and features.

Is this plugin compatable on latest wordpress and elementor version ?

Yes

Does it work with Elementor Pro?

yes
